bibl.author: John M. Binckley
bibl.title: John M. Binckley to S. J. W. Tabor, 31 October 1867

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I enclose herewith a copy of the Attorney General's opinion of the 18th May last, respecting pay of retired Naval Officers, and have the honor to request to be informed as early as convenient whether or not the practise of the accounting officers has proceeded heretofore upon a similar view of the act of 1862, referred to therein.
